text: hananim-i naelin gyesileul mid-eu la haess-eul ttae uliege gyesidoen geos eul midnaida lago daedabhadoe geu ihuui geos-eun geugeos-i sasil-im-eul hwag jeunghamyeonseodo bulsinhadoda geudeul-i midneun jadeul-ilamyeon geu ijeon-ui seonji jadeul-eul wae salhae hayeossneunga geudeul-e ge mul-eobola
